events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I didn't get what I paid for.
The customer's case has been categorized under Refund based on their request for money back due to receiving the wrong product.
The refund support agent has been assigned to handle this customer's request to ensure timely processing.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to verify the issue and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a picture showing the incorrect product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund for your order and send you a prepaid return label to send the wrong item back.
Thanks for handling this promptly. I appreciate the quick solution and will send the return package today.
Your refund has been issued and you should see the credit on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We wanted to follow up to ensure your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support.
